parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.08

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Locations

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns an array of locations of chosen type(s) within the given radius of the given position, sorted from nearest to farthest.
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Informative </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> Although locations can be placed in 3D with [[setPosition]], [[nearestLocations]] search result is sorted in 2D.</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[nearestLocations]] [position, [locationType1, locationType2, ...], radius, sortPosition]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> position: [[Array]] - [[Position2D]], [[Position3D]] or [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> locationTypeX: [[String]] - [[Location#Location Types|location type]] name, e.g "NameCity"

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> radius: [[Number]] - maximum distance from the given position that returned locations may be, in meters.

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> sortPosition: [[Array]] - (Optional) [[Position2D]], [[Position3D]] or [[Object]] - results will be sorted from the distance to given ''sortPosition'' (nearest to farthest still)

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] of [[Location|locations]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_nearbyLocations = [[nearestLocations]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[position]] [[player]], ["RockArea", "VegetationFir"], 100];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> Find any of nearest locations:<code>[[private]] _allLocationTypes = [];
"_allLocationTypes [[pushBack]] [[configName]] _x" [[configClasses]] ([[configFile]] >> "CfgLocationTypes");
{
	[[systemChat]] [[format]] [
		"%1 (%2) - %3m", 
		_x, 
		[[text]] _x, 
		[[position]] [[player]] [[distance]] _x
	];
} [[forEach]] [[nearestLocations]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[player]], _allLocationTypes, 500];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[createLocation]], [[nearestLocation]], [[locationPosition]], [[nearestLocationWithDubbing]]
</value></part></template>
